name: Digital City
address: Prince Turki Ibn Abdulaziz Al Awwal Rd، Prince Turki Bin Abdulaziz, Riyadh
description: Saudi Arabia’s first mixed-use development with commercial, residential, and retail offerings. Underpinned by international-standard services and facilities, Digital City is the optimal destination for forward-thinkers and urban-living enthusiasts. The development is designed to stimulate and nurture a knowledge-based economy by cultivating an innovative business environment and a dynamic workplace. Digital City feature a world-class assortment of retail selections, smarter services and technologically advanced features. It is a community that fosters inclusivity and is driven by a commitment to excellence.Digital City, Saudi Arabia’s first mixed use development, offers you a greater variety of food and beverage options.

name: Boulevard Riyadh City
address: Hittin, Riyadh 13516
description: The Boulevard area includes amazing huge and colourful screens and contains a dancing fountain surrounded by outdoor and indoor seats that will amaze visitors. You will enjoy cosplay shows and musical performances in a family-friendly atmosphere, as well as various live theatre shows at the Bakr Al-Sheddi Theater, and acrobatic shows that surprise adults and children at the Global Theater. Tickets, Children under the age of 12 enter the Boulevard area for free, as for adults, the ticket costs 25 SAR from Saturday to Wednesday, and it costs 50 SAR on Thursday and Friday.

name: Doos Karting
address: 8521 Prince Mohammed Ibn Salman Ibn Abdulaziz Rd, Hittin, Riyadh 13513
description: The Perfect Place for Simulation Race Experience. Enjoy the multi-level tracks of racing adventure at Doos Karting, the indoor electric karting track in Riyadh. The karting has an indoor track about 350 m long, and other multi-level spiral ramps. Electric karts can reach a speed of about two rounds per minute.

name: Last hour
address: Abi Bakr As Siddiq Branch Rd, Al Wadi, Riyadh 13313
canonical: مرحبا بك في لعبة - الساعة الأخيرة (lasthour.sa)
description: An exciting adventure, physical and mental activity awaits you, completely separating you from your routine. The idea of the rooms is based on the attempt of a team of at least two people and no more than 11 people, to escape before the time expires, using the skills of solving puzzles, deciphering codes, and linking codes, your ingenuity will control the course of the game, and you have to overcome a lot of laughter and tension to solve puzzles before the time expires.

name: Snowy Forest
address: Prince Muhammad Ibn Saad Ibn Abdulaziz Rd, Al Malqa, Almakan Mall, Riyadh 13521
description: Snowy Forest is one of the best soft play areas for your children (one through twelve years old) to live a fun-based playtime experience in a safe environment. The play area is made up of cushioned softly-padded floors and has slides, a trampoline, a maze and climbing walls in addition to a number of amusing interactive video games. The playground is also provided with a number of amenities such as a bathroom, a retail centre and seating areas for escorts.

name: Dirab Golf and Country Club
address: Riyadh 19813
description: Dirab Golf and Country Club provides unique educational experiences for all levels of golfers from beginners to advanced golfers. This is part of a distinctive set of facilities for a unique experience suitable for families, members and guests participating through a comprehensive set of individual and group lessons.

name: Khozam Karting
address: Khuzam Rd, Ar Rimal, Riyadh 13428
description: The Khozam Karting Circuit welcomes adventure seekers in two categories of racing cars: single and double. The racetrack is very exciting and has numerous safe corners and turns suitable for amateurs and professionals. The place also includes an entertainment area for children that includes electric games, and play sand, which stimulate their learning and discovery skills. Inside the center is a café serving delicious snacks and drinks; families can spend some time while their children play.

name: Ahaji
address: 6157 Abi Bakr As Siddiq Branch Rd, An Narjis, Riyadh 13323
canonical: لعبة الهروب أحاجي | Ahaji Escape Room
description: The games are distributed in rooms named; Uncle Saleh, Ward 23, and The Pyramid. You will have a fantastic experience searching, exploring, and solving riddles by investigating the hidden objects in the room to test your connecting and inference skills. You can come again to try the other rooms for another fun day.

name: Escape the room
address: Riyadh - Exit 5 - King abdulAziz road, Riyadh
description: You can live a unique adventure in the Escape the room in Riyadh with your family or friends. It includes four separate rooms, containing multiple puzzles, symbols and codes which must be solved so that you and your group can leave the room before the specified time which is 60 minutes. This is an adventure full of suspense and mystery, that requires mental and physical efforts, with lots of excitement and fun.

name: Chuck E. Cheese
address: 6291, 3360 6291 Imam Abdullah Bin Saud Bin Abdulaziz Branch Road, Riyadh 13241
description: Chuck E. Cheese is an indoor entertainment center that offers you a chance to create happy family memories with your kids. It is a place where kids can happily play in a safe indoor area that allows your kids to try some interactive games to enhance their social skills and immerse in action games that challenge their physical abilities. They can even play some electronic games that will take them to the world of fantasy. All of these experiences in one wonderful place.

name: Snow City
address: MQPG+58 Al Othaim Mall، 7454 Eastern Ring Branch Rd, Ar Rabwah, Riyadh 12839
description: Snow City is an ideal place for all family members, where adults and children alike can enjoy the cold weather, play in the snow, and do various types of snow activities. When you enter the city of snow, Riyadh, you will feel as if you have traveled in moments from Riyadh to one of the high mountains covered with snow in one of the cold countries. At a time when the temperatures outside can reach 45 degrees Celsius, the temperatures there will be approximately below zero - 3 degrees Celsius. Although the Snow City in Riyadh is located within a closed hall, you will feel that you are in the open air, mainly due to the large area of ​​the place, which exceeds 4,500 square meters. This vast area will provide you with the necessary space to wander between the areas covered with white snow and ice and enjoy many of the distinctive activities of the place. .

name: FunXtreme Karting
address: Jabal Ajyad Rd, Dahiat Namar, Riyadh 14977
description: Fun Extreme Karting is the suitable destination for all people, adventurers, and fans of exciting sports and adrenaline, as it provides an outdoor car racing circuit dedicated to karting and is suitable for both adults and children alike (children can sit accompanied by an adult), in addition to hosting local competitions periodically, It is located in Dirab Sports Square.

name: The Zone
address: Al Takhassousi, Al Mohammadiyyah, Qads 19282
description: with its modern architectural design, The Zone offers a variety of international and local restaurants and cafes lined up in wide walkways that add glamour and beauty to the place. You will be surrounded by the leafy palm trees with a dancing fountain in the middle that mesmerizes visitors with its shows and delightful colors.

name: Rawdat Tinhat
address: 3GH6+5H8, Umm Rajum
description: Rawdat Tinhat is one of the most beautiful camping sites where a grove of dense green plant cover adorned with aromatic tulips is in tune with beautiful sounds of birds, great atmosphere and fresh air. It is located 185km north of Riyadh, Rumah province. It is the final mouth of a number of valleys, its gorgeous image is completed by the sands of Nafud Ad Dahna that adorn its northern and eastern sides. Discover the captivating magic that is hidden in Rawdat Tinhat in spring, as natural components blend together to create the best place to walk, explore, and spend a day-time picnic with family on green carpets.  Admire the sunset scenery, or enjoy a night barbeque party accompanied by the chatter and laughter of your friends. All you have to do is to prepare for the camping, get the necessary equipment from the stalls on the highway, choose a full-moon night, and enjoy the most pleasant and serene days, under the starry sky and the splendor of moonlight.

name: Wadi Namar
address: HMCH+QVX, Namar, Riyadh 14962
description: Wadi Namar enables you to watch the roam of ducks’ flock and the spread of small fish in the Lake Dam. Inspirational thoughts will flow to your mind as you walk along the park’s paths that extend over 2,000m, amidst the fresh air of nature, the rustle of palm trees, and the roar of the lake’s waterfalls. The nature of the place integrates together, giving you the opportunity to take pictures of the sunset, or admire the starry sky at night, in a scene in which the reflected lights of the valley shine around. Facilities and services are available along the park, such as the food stalls, where it is fun to eat fast food with friends and family, in addition to play areas filled with the children’s energy, and parking spots.

name: Heet Cave
address: Hyt, Riyadh 14369
description: At a 30-km distance in the outskirts of Riyadh, on the South of the road leading to Al-Kharj, lies Heet Cave, a geological landmark about which many interesting stories have been told. You are promised to see one of the most beautiful natural landmarks, which dates back to thousands of years. Many exciting stories have been told about it, most notably is that it was formed as a rocky cavity with a depth of 390 m inside a mountain after a celestial body struck the Earth. The cave is an ancient source of water and its location is distinguished for walks and hiking. It is surrounded by majestic historical stories. The path leads you to a spring that flows throughout the year inside the cave, forming a reservoir of pure groundwater. This groundwater was an important source for the forces of the founding King Abdulaziz bin Abdul Rahman Al Saud in his battles dating back to more than 90 years. Any time an adventure-seeker wants to be amazed; the cave is open around the clock. It is located opposite the highway, so it is easily accessible. Given the nature of the area surrounding the cave, if you are accompanied by children, we suggest that you lead the way to this masterpiece. The rich stories about Heet Cave may push you to extend your trip and camp next to the cave for a night or two with friends. We suggest driving and SUV to it. Professional swimmers and those who love exciting experiences can enjoy swimming in the fresh spring water.

name: Alwaha Park
address: PPPC+J5X, King Salman Neighborhood, Riyadh 12442
description: You can release the stress of the day by taking long walks in the paved paths surrounded by trees. There are also areas to play football and practice some sports activities. There is also a café that serves light meals and refreshing drinks.

name: Rawdat Al-Kharara Park
address: C64W+RFM, Al-Muzahmiya 19683
description: Al Kharrarah National Park, located in the South of Al Muzahimiyah Governorate, West of Riyadh, is your spacious sanctuary to escape from the crowded city. You can relax and sit amid nature, which is full of green landscapes, sand dunes, and a lake formed from rainfall. Wild Sidr trees and annual plants also grow in the park. You will enjoy a serenity-filled family time. You can live exciting adventures on SUVs as they challenge the high sand dunes. You can also caress the sky with kites with your friends, or refresh with a dip in the cold nature’s water on a sunny day in the park’s lake.

name: Al Areen Equestrian Club
address: Al Janadriyah Rd, Al Jenadriyah District، Riyadh 13635
description: Al- Areen Equestrian Club offers many services for horse lovers including: horse riding, training programs, educational programs, and horse shelter and care services in its stables. The club opens its doors for visitors at 5:30 am and is open until 11:30 pm, all days of the week except Sundays. New sections were added to the club and the traditional and classic seating areas are now more luxurious. The club also has a variety of recreational facilities and offers activities for groups such as: yoga before horse riding. During your horse riding tour, you will be greeted and accompanied by a professional service crew. In addition, children will find the necessary level of attention they need from trainers that have extensive experience in the field of horse riding and taming. It is advised to bring your favorite foods and drinks with you to the club.

name: Riyadh Zoo
address: MPGP+J6W, Al Ihsaa, Al Malaz, Riyadh 12831
description: The Riyadh Zoo is the largest and oldest park in Saudi. Count on seeing zebras, elephants, giraffes and maybe even a white lion! Kids will also love the entertaining shows at the zoo's theatre. Tickets for adults are SR 11.50 and SR 5.75 for children.

name: Flowers Garden
address: PMJ2+V73, Al Takhassousi, Al Mohammadiyyah, Riyadh 12363
top_feature: It contains a pond in the middle
description: The rose garden contains a large number of fruit trees, especially palm trees, in addition to green plants and herbs that dress the garden in a green dress that soothes the hearts.

name: L'Antica Pizzeria Da Michele
address: Prince Turki Ibn Abdulaziz Al Awwal Rd, King Saud University, Riyadh 12373
description: L'Antica Pizzeria Da Michele is an authentic Italian pizzeria, Known for its traditional Neapolitan-style pizzas, this restaurant offers a cozy and inviting atmosphere. The pizzas are prepared with high-quality ingredients, including fresh mozzarella cheese and San Marzano tomatoes, resulting in a delicious and flavorful dining experience.

name: Armin
address: 2896 Al Shariqah, 7973،، Riyadh 12364
description: Armin is a popular restaurant that specializes in Middle Eastern cuisine. With a modern and elegant ambiance, Armin offers a diverse menu featuring a wide range of dishes inspired by the rich flavors of the region. From savory grilled meats to aromatic rice-based dishes, diners can enjoy a culinary journey through Middle Eastern flavors.

name: bayaz
address: Prince Turki Bin Abdulaziz Al Awal Rood, Riyadh
description: Bayaz is a contemporary café, offering a relaxed and trendy setting for coffee enthusiasts. Known for its specialty coffee and artisanal brews, Bayaz sources high-quality beans from around the world. Whether you're in the mood for a perfectly brewed espresso, a creamy latte, or a refreshing cold brew, Bayaz promises a delightful coffee experience.

name: Tanjiah Restaurant
address: Imam Saud Bin Abdulaziz Bin Mohammed Rood,  Riyadh
description: Tangier Restaurant embodies the Moroccan table known for its diversity of dishes and delicious food. The food itself has special rituals, starting from its preparation and cooking until the moment it is served in distinctive clay pots. Moroccan dishes vary according to region and cultural heritage. The name Tangia is one of the famous dishes in Marrakesh, and in Tangia Restaurant, the authenticity of Morocco is evident through the warm reception and warmth of affection, in addition to the attention to decorations and brightness, all the way to the most delicious.

name: Shrimp Nation
address: Al Takhassousi, Riyadh
description: Shrimp Nation Restaurant is one of the famous seafood restaurant chains in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The restaurant offers a variety of fried dishes, soups, rice, shrimp, and oysters, served with three different types of spices (hot, medium, and regular) mixed with a delicious sauce (butter, garlic, lemon pepper, white cheese, Shrimp Nation secret sauce).

name: Najd Village
address: King Abdul Aziz Branch Rood, Riyadh
description: This restaurant offers a wonderful variety of delicious Arabic and Saudi food options, starting with appetizers, kabsa, and jareesh, as it is considered the best choice for taking your family and spending a fun time in a distinctive traditional Arab atmosphere.

name: Zafran Indian Bistro
address: Makkah Al Mukarramah Br Rood, Umm Al Hamam Al Sharqi, Turki Square,Riyadh
description: Zafran Indian Bistro offers a fusion menu with traditional dishes and distinct flavors – mild, spicy, sweet and more. Inside, you will find some all-time favorites like the famous Tikka Masala, Chicken Korma, Biryani with different meats, and different types of curries. The menu also offers side dishes, such as samosas, mint naan bread, plain chapatis, and various yogurts with additional ingredients such as cucumber or mint.

name: Salt
address: Northern Ring Road, Al Aqiq District;Riyadh Park,Riyadh
description: Salt Restaurant is one of the best burger restaurants in Riyadh. The restaurant offers a selection of the most delicious types of burgers and fries. The restaurant is known for its attention to the smallest details to come up with the best high-quality product for the restaurant’s customers.

name: Catch22
address: Al Mohammadiyyah, Riyadh
description: Catch 22 Restaurant is a contemporary restaurant with a Western flair. It offers a variety of Western food items, starting from burgers, pasta, salad, meat dishes, and sushi, in addition to hot and cold drinks. The restaurant provides indoor and outdoor seating overlooking the complex’s fountain, in addition to family seating. With distinctive decorations.

name: Soltree
address: District, Prince Turki Ibn Abdulaziz Al Awwal Rd
description: Soultree is a restaurant with a new healthy food concept that provides meals prepared with balanced nutritional values with a main focus on whole food ingredients. They believe that healthy eating should be delicious and enjoyable without deprivation so that it becomes more of a lifestyle than a diet.

name: Count It
address: Al Yasmine Riyadh
description: Healthy meals restaurant: salads, main meals, sandwiches, burgers, pasta, protein options with carbs. They offer a monthly subscription.

name: Zero fatty
address: Imam Saud bin Abdulaziz bin Muhammad Al-Bari Road
canonical: زيرو فاتي - محل سلطات في الرياض (business.site)
description: A restaurant specializing in salads only.

name: Urth Caffe
address: Riyadh Park, Northern Ring Rd, Al Aqiq, Riyadh
description: The geographical diversity in Riyadh makes it a place that attracts you to tourism and discovery.(Reef) is a space for a Saudi identity that began decades ago. It has the antiquity of history with a distinctive rural touch that developed through stages multiple,Your experience here will be interesting. Here in (Reef) you can live the country vibes, in a distinctive, sophisticated and varied way.

name: Half Million
address: Uthman Ibn Affan Rd, An Nada, Riyadh
description: Half Million is a Saudi coffee brand that launched in 2018 in Riyadh and has since expanded to serve most of the regions in Saudi Arabia. Half Million’s values are based on being Saudi, local, humane, agile, ambitious, and customer-centric. We pride ourselves on being a local pioneer in the food and beverage industry and always aiming to provide a unique combination consisting of high quality, affordable pricing, and the best customer experience.

name: Sulalat Coffee
address: Makkah Al Mukarramah Branch Road , Najm al Qurais Building, Riyadh
description: Immerse yourself in the delicious tastes of coffee at Sulalat Coffee, where the sweetness of caramel flavor blends in your mouth with specially roasted coffee beans, and you can get the finest coffee preparation tools from the cafe to prepare it at home whenever you want.

name: Knoll Coffee Roasters
address: Tarif Street, Al Izdihar, Riyadh
description: Cups of latte filled with caramel sweetness await you at Nol Roastery and Café, where the bakery menu complements the deliciousness of your coffee with chocolate chips stuffed into pieces of cookies whose sweetness melts in your mouth.

name: Elixir Bunn Coffee Roasters
address: Salem Bin Maaqil Al Nakheel Dist , Riyadh
description: Elixir Bunn Coffee Roasters is a specialty coffee shop and roastery that aims to provide a unique coffee experience. With a focus on sustainability and ethical sourcing, Elixir Bunn offers a selection of handcrafted coffees roasted in-house. The café's cozy atmosphere and knowledgeable baristas create an ideal environment for coffee lovers to explore and savor their favorite brews.

name: Al Murabba Palace
address: King Saud Road, Riyadh
description: The walls of Al Murabba Historial Palace are like a window to the rich history of Riyadh and a scene from its ancient memory. The 1680 m2 of land occupied by the palace overflows with the memories of the place, and the historical events it witnessed, along with the glory that was made on its land. The palace has 32 rooms divided over 2 floors, receptions for the king’s guests, and administrative offices for the king's aides and guards.

name: The Royal Saudi Air Force Museum
code: The Royal Saudi Air Force Museum
address: East Ring Road of Riyadh Between Exits 10 and 11 Junction of Prince Abdullah Road & Service Road
description: This museum has a great list of aircraft and mechanical collectibles. Some of its corners contain bright and distinctive booths, which guarantee you a fun and exciting trip on all levels.  It has different educational and recreational activities, so it is a suitable destination for school and family trips and aviation lovers.  The museum welcomes visitors daily from 4 to 9 PM with a small fee.

name: Naila Art Gallery
address: Northern Ring Road Riyadh
description: The Gallery invite you to interact with the artistic and cultural dimensions of the works, their colors, forms, and embodied meanings. On the other hand, the three-dimensional art forms and creative artistic sculptures give you the opportunity to discover the unprecedented aesthetic sense of the artists’ prolific imagination that can last for long. At the exhibition halls, artistic nights and cultural events and gatherings are held with specialized local and international artists and critics usually in cooperation with the Ministry of Culture and Mohammad bin Salman Foundation (Misk). You can also enjoy an artistic experience in the periodical workshops held by renowned artists with the purpose of helping you form a new innovative perspective of the art world.

name: Masmak Palace
address: Qasr al-Masmak, Al Imam Turki ibn Abdullah ibn Muhammad, Dirah, Riyadh
description: Standing Masmak Palace Al-Ateeq stands tall in the center of Riyadh, his majesty did not stand in the way of the extension of his splendor, so he turned into a tourist destination after being a silent witness to major events in the history of the founding of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The palace was built in the fourteenth century AH, during the reign of Imam Abdullah bin Faisal, and it was his residence. Today, the palace is a theatrical narrator of an authentic history of the restoration of government and the country, narrating the landmarks of that period and the history of its leaders in its exhibition halls, after it was turned into a museum in 1416 AH / 1995 AD.

name: The National Museum
address: King Faisal Road, King Abdul Aziz Historical Centre, Riyadh
description: The National Museum holds a massive collection of artifacts gathered from all throughout the nation, the location guarantees you a tour that is both instructive and enlightening. The sculptures, tombs, weaponry, artwork, crafts, jewels, engravings, and more will transport you to the country’s ancient past. It is a great spot to spend hours delving deep into the history of the nation. It has eight galleries spread across two levels that have been thoughtfully arranged to take a visitor on a voyage from pre-history right up to the current day.

name: Old Diriyah
address: Northwest outskirts of Riyadh, near Wadi Hanifah
description: The first Saudi state was established in historical Diriyah by Imam Muhammad bin Saud, laying the groundwork for the region’s exceptional prosperity of human civilisation. Diriyah’s At-Turaif district, which is a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is among the top destinations for gaining a deeper grasp of history. To revive its old past, it underwent a protracted repair process. According to history, the city was completely destroyed during the conflict between the Ottoman and Saudi armies in the 19th century. The siege occurred here, making it the most important tourist destination in Riyadh.
